title: Log in and it takes me straight into a game...even though I'm not it a game
body:
So, I got done with a ranked game and logged out to reset input (stats, LP, etc.) and when I went to log back in, it took me straight into a game and told me that I could not connect to it. But I just gotten out of one game and then logged out...didn't que up a new game....anyone else have this problem before? Need help!

Tried logging in again @ 1610 hundred hours and still in the "limbo" loop

replies.body: Same here, Its just I was in a norm finished the game and tried to inv my friend and none of them got the inv, I relogged and was carried straight into a game, It wont connect and I cant get out of it.
Same here also
Yeah, I'm having the same problem

Hey everyone,

Wanted to jump in and say we're looking into higher than normal reports of ghost games on NA. While rare, it can happen sometimes, though normally should have a maximum limit of ~2 hours.  We're doing a bit of investigating, though it looks like things are clearing up now.  We'll keep an eye on things for a bit though just in case we see another spike of ghost games.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VbR3vKXm,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-09-20T23:01:59.453+0000)
>
> Hey everyone,
> 
> Wanted to jump in and say we're looking into higher than normal reports of ghost games on NA. While rare, it can happen sometimes, though normally should have a maximum limit of ~2 hours.  We're doing a bit of investigating, though it looks like things are clearing up now.  We'll keep an eye on things for a bit though just in case we see another spike of ghost games.

It happened to my boyfriend 5 minutes ago (~7:35PM EST), after an ARAM game I skipped waiting for stats because it was taking a while, but I was fine. My BF, on the other hand, is stuck in limbo where the LoL servers insist he's in a game.
We're taking a look now to see if there's another spike, or just additional one-offs in ghost games.
Happening to me as well, Game ended 40min ago, Its accurately showing up on op.gg however.   But client still stuck on reconnect

Yah.  This is because the game ends properly, but for whatever reason the message from the game servers back to your client saying "Hey! Game's over! GOOPHED is ready for another game!" doesn't get received, so your client just keeps waiting.

Looks like we're seeing another round of higher than usual ghost games, so the team is investigating now

Ah, I see, Appreciate the update.  Thanks!

Update: 2 hours later, Still stuck =\
Sorry to bum the celebration, But I'm stuck In this endless loop. Rito pls D:
Same. RIOT WE NEED YOU
All fixed

So  a workaround that I troubleshooted for me and my friend for this issue is to delete the league client in your Riot Games folder and then launching the client to force a repair/re-patch. So go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.97\deploy and delete LeagueClient.exe

Be sure not to delete LeagueClientUx.exe or LeagueClientUxRender.exe

Once youve done that, simply launch your client. Itll force a repair and download the missing .exe which should take less than 5 minutes and then you should be fine. Let me know if this works for any of you guys. Hope this helps :D

Edit: Maybe this was just a coincidence :P

> [{quoted}](name=MaelTec,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VbR3vKXm,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2017-09-21T02:18:03.594+0000)
>
> So  a workaround that I troubleshooted for me and my friend for this issue is to delete the league client in your Riot Games folder and then launching the client to force a repair/re-patch. So go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.97\deploy and delete LeagueClient.exe
> 
> Be sure not to delete LeagueClientUx.exe or LeagueClientUxRender.exe
> 
> Once youve done that, simply launch your client. Itll force a repair and download the missing .exe which should take less than 5 minutes and then you should be fine. Let me know if this works for any of you guys. Hope this helps :D
> 
> Edit: Maybe this was just a coincidence :P

Edit: Looks like it's happening in waves or something, as my game also ended at approx the same time that @Zappman says that his did.
I'm seeing an influx or reports about this right now.  I'll see what I can find out, but it may be another occurrence.
